New Records: Jude Bellingham scored England's first shot on target in the match with an overhead kick in the 95th minute, breaking the deadlock and sending the game into extra time.
Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham equalized for England with a dramatic overhead kick just before extra time, and Harry Kane headed in the winner within a minute of extra time to secure the victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate's job was on the line after England almost crashed out, but Jude Bellingham's late goal and Harry Kane's winner saved their campaign.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was described as a 'great escape' for England, evoking memories of the 1986 World Cup quarter-final. The theme 'The Great Escape' played throughout the stadium during extra time.
